title: Ministry Of Fear ( 1944) Directed By Fritz Lang, Starring Ray Milland, Dan Duryea, Margaret Reynolds

sources.title: Ministry Of Fear ( 1944) Directed By Fritz Lang, Starring Ray Milland, Dan Duryea, Margaret Reynolds
sources.description: Ministry of Fear is a 1944 American FILM NOlR crime film directed by Fritz Lang, based on the 1943 novel by Graham Greene. The film stars Ray Milland, Dan Duryea and Margaret Reynolds The original music for the film was composed by Victor Young. Â  You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia and read an article from FILM NOlR of the Week .
